price: Na wachelee wale ambao lau kuwa na wao wangeli acha nyuma yao watoto wanyonge wangeli wakhofia. Basi nao wamche Mwenyezi Mungu, na waseme maneno yaliyo sawa.
arabic: وَلۡيَخۡشَ ٱلَّذِينَ لَوۡ تَرَكُواْ مِنۡ خَلۡفِهِمۡ ذُرِّيَّةٗ ضِعَٰفًا خَافُواْ عَلَيۡهِمۡ فَلۡيَتَّقُواْ ٱللَّهَ وَلۡيَقُولُواْ قَوۡلٗا سَدِيدًا
footnotes: Watu watahadhari na kuwadhulumu mayatima, na wawaogopee watoto wao wanyonge wasije na wao wakadhulumiwa kwa watendavyo wazee kwa mayatima wa watu wengine. Na wamwogope Mwenyezi Mungu katika kuwatendea mayatima. Na waseme maneno yaliyo kaa sawa yanayo fuata haki, wala wasimdhulumu yeyote.
